commandlist:
* `+<search> serĉmendo` - serĉi per ŝlosilvortoj (nur en Bible Gateway versioj)
* `+<setversion> VER` - metu preferan version al VER
* `+<version>` - vidu la version, ke vi metis
* `+<versions>` - vidu la subtenatajn versiojn
* `+<versioninfo> VER` - legu informo pri versio, uzanta la acronimon
* `+<random>` - ricevu hazardan Biblian verson
* `+<verseoftheday>` (`+<votd>`) - ricevu la verson de la tago
* `+<headings> <enable>/<disable>` - ebligu aŭ malvalidigu temajn titolojn
* `+<versenumbers> <enable>/<disable>` - ebligu aŭ malvalidigu versajn nombrojn
* `+<setlanguage> LING` - metu preferan lingvon al LING
* `+<language>` - vidu vian nuntempan lingvon, se vi metis unu (defaŭlta: la angla)
* `+<languages>` - vidu la subtenatajn lingvojn
* `+<users>` - listigu ĉiojn uzantojn pere de ĉioj serviloj (ne kalkulanta kopiojn aŭ robotojn)
* `+<servers>` - listigu ĉiojn servilojn, ke BibliRoboto estas ĉe
* `+<invite>` - akiri la invito por BibliaRoboto
* `+<supporters>` - la subtenantoj de BibliRoboto
guildcommandlist:
* `+<setguildversion> ABBV` - set the guild's default version to ABBV
* `+<guildversion>` - see the default version for this guild
* `+<setguildlanguage> LANG` - set the guild's default language to LANG
* `+<guildlanguage>` - see the guild's default language, if one is set (default: english)
* `+<setvotdtime> TIME` - set the VOTD scheduler time to TIME (TIME must be 24h format and in UTC)
* `+<clearvotdtime>` - clear the VOTD scheduler time
* `+<votdtime>` - see the VOTD scheduler time and channel
usage: Uzi ĝin, diru Biblian verson. Mi prizorgos la restaĵon.
apostlestext1: I believe in God, the Father almighty, creator of heaven and earth. I believe in Jesus Christ, God's only Son, our Lord, who was conceived by the Holy Spirit, born of the Virgin Mary, suffered under Pontius Pilate, was crucified, died, and was buried; he descended to the dead. On the third day he rose again; he ascended into heaven, he is seated at the right hand of the Father, and he will come again to judge the living and the dead. I believe in the Holy Spirit, the holy catholic Church, the communion of saints, the forgiveness of sins, the resurrection of the body, and the life everlasting. Amen.
nicenetext1: I believe in one God, the Father Almighty, Maker of Heaven and earth, and of all things visible and invisible.
nicenetext2: And in one Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of God, the Only-begotten, begotten of the Father before all ages; Light of Light: true God of true God; begotten, not made; of one essence with the Father, by Whom all things were made; Who for us men, and for our salvation, came down from the heavens, and was incarnate of the Holy Spirit and the Virgin Mary, and became man; And was crucified for us under Pontius Pilate, and suffered, and was buried; And arose again on the third day according to the Scriptures; And ascended into the heavens, and sitteth at the right hand of the Father; And shall come again, with glory, to judge both the living and the dead; Whose kingdom shall have no end.
nicenetext3: And in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the Giver of Life; Who proceedeth from the Father*; Who with the Father and the Son together is worshipped and glorified; Who spake by the prophets.
nicenetext4:
In One, Holy, Catholic, and Apostolic Church. I confess one baptism for the remission of sins. I look for the resurrection of the dead, And the life of the age to come. Amen.

* - some churches may include 'and the Son.'
chalcedoniantext1: We, then, following the holy Fathers, all with one consent, teach men to confess one and the same Son, our Lord Jesus Christ, the same perfect in Godhead and also perfect in manhood; truly God and truly man, of a reasonable soul and body; consubstantial with the Father according to the Godhead, and consubstantial with us according to the Manhood; in all things like unto us, without sin; begotten before all ages of the Father according to the Godhead, and in these latter days, for us and for our salvation, born of the Virgin Mary, the Mother of God, according to the Manhood;
chalcedoniantext2: one and the same Christ, Son, Lord, only begotten, to be acknowledged in two natures, inconfusedly, unchangeably, indivisibly, inseparably; the distinction of natures being by no means taken away by the union, but rather the property of each nature being preserved, and concurring in one Person and one Subsistence, not parted or divided into two persons, but one and the same Son, and only begotten, God the Word, the Lord Jesus Christ; as the prophets from the beginning have declared concerning Him, and the Lord Jesus Christ Himself has taught us, and the Creed of the holy Fathers has handed down to us.
pseudoathanasiantext1: The creed is too long for Discord, here's a link instead:
creedstext:
These are the creeds available in BibleBot:

`+<apostles>` - The Apostles' Creed
`+<nicene>` - The Nicene-Constantinopolitan Creed
`+<chalcedonian>` - The Chalcedonian Creed
`+<athanasian>` - The Pseudo-Athanasian Creed
versionused: Vi uzas <version>. Uzu `+<setversion>` meti malsaman version.
noversionused: Mi ne trovis vian nomon en mia datumbazo, ĉu vi uzis `+<setversion>` ankoraŭ?
languageused: You are using Replace_With_Language_Name. Use `+<setlanguage>` to set a different language.
otnotsupported: La versio <version> ne subtenas la Malnovan Testamenton.
ntnotsupported: La versio <version> ne subtenas la Novan Testamenton.
deunotsupported: La versio <version> ne subtenas la Apokrifon/Duakanonon.
otnotsupported2: Se vi volas uzi la Malnovan Testamenton, `+<setversion>` al versio ke enhavas ĝin.
ntnotsupported2: Se vi volas uzi la Novan Testamenton, `+<setversion>` al versio ke enhavas ĝin.
deunotsupported2: Se vi volas uzi la Apokrifon/Duakanonon, `+<setversion>` al versio ke enhavas ĝin.

noguildversionused: I couldn't find this guild in my database, has someone with the 'Manage Server' permission used `+<setguildversion>` yet?

Have someone with the 'Manage Server' use `+<setguildbrackets>` to set different brackets.

passagetoolong: La legaĵo estas tro longa ekkapti por mi, mi pardonpetas.
votdcantprocess: La VDLT ne estas pretigita, vidu <https://www.biblegateway.com/> por la VDLT.
versioninfo:
**<versionname>**

Enhavas Malnova Testamento: <hasOT>
Enhavas Nova Testamento: <hasNT>
Enhavas Apokrifon/Duakanonon: <hasDEU>
versioninfofailed: Mi ne povas trovi tion version, ĉu vi uzis la pravan akronimon?
users: La numero de ĉioj uzantoj trans ĉioj serviloj, ke BibliRoboto estas sur (sin kopiojn)
queryTooShort: Via serĉmendo devas esti pli longa ol 3 literoj.
supporters: Speciala danko al la sekvantaj kontribuantoj:
donorsNotListed: Kaj tiuj ne sur la listo!
